name: Cephalic Carnage
description:
'''Cephalic Carnage''' was an American [[death metal]] band formed in [[Denver, Colorado]] in 1992. The band comprised vocalist Leonard Leal, guitarists Steve Goldberg and Brian Hopp, drummer John Merryman and bassist Nick Schendzielos. Cephalic Carnage has released six studio albums and toured in North America, Europe and Japan.

Cephalic Carnage played a technically proficient deathgrind style, prolifically experimented with other genres, and incorporated songs of joke nature into their albums, such as parodies of [[black metal]] or [[metalcore]]. They referred to themselves as "rocky mountain hydro [[grindcore|grind]]".
